perturbation.original_text: Hydraspin hereby appoints Distributor, and Distributor hereby accepts appointment, as Hydraspin's exclusive distributor of the Products in the Territory during the term of this Agreement, subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, including, but not limited to, the satisfaction of the Performance Benchmarks.
perturbation.changed_text: Hydraspin hereby appoints Distributor, and Distributor hereby accepts appointment, as Hydraspin's exclusive distributor of the Products in the Territory during the term of this Agreement. The fulfillment of the Performance Benchmarks will be a factor when considering renewal.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that exclusivity is subject to meeting Performance Benchmarks. The changed text makes meeting those benchmarks merely a factor for renewal, weakening the obligation and creating ambiguity about whether failing to meet them automatically forfeits exclusivity during the Initial Term.

perturbation.original_text: Hydraspin shall provide the Products to Distributor's Customers at no cost to Distributor or the Customers, except solely for the Hydraspin Share of Net Revenue, which shall be due and payable to Hydraspin as set forth in this Article VI. Likewise, Hydraspin shall install, service and maintain the Products, with the commercially reasonable assistance of Distributor, at no cost to Distributor or the customers except solely for the Hydraspin Share of Net Revenue, which shall be due and payable to Hydraspin as set forth in this Article VI.
perturbation.changed_text: Hydraspin shall provide the Products to Distributor's Customers at a reduced rate to Distributor or the Customers, as Hydraspin deems appropriate. Hydraspin shall install the Products, and Distributor shall service and maintain the Products at the cost they see fit.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states Hydraspin shall provide the products at no cost, except for the Hydraspin share. The changed text states the products shall be provided at a reduced rate to Distributor or the Customer, and the distributor shall service and maintain the products, creating a contradiction.

perturbation.original_text: The initial term of this Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and end on the five (5) year anniversary of the Effective Date (the "Initial Term"), unless sooner terminated pursuant to the terms hereof. Upon expiration of the Initial Term of this Agreement, this Agreement will automatically renew for additional, successive five (5) year periods unless either Party provides the other Party written notice of its desire to terminate at least one hundred twenty (120) days prior to the end of the Initial Term or any renewal.
perturbation.changed_text: The initial term of this Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and end on the five (5) year anniversary of the Effective Date (the "Initial Term"), unless otherwise agreed upon by both parties. Upon expiration of the Initial Term of this Agreement, this Agreement will renew at the discretion of Hydraspin.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that the agreement will automatically renew for successive five year periods, unless a party provides written notice of termination. The changed text says that the agreement will renew at the sole discretion of Hydraspin, creating an internal contradiction.
